drawRotatedString

public static void drawRotatedString(java.lang.String text,
                                     Canvas canvas,
                                     float x,
                                     float y,
                                     TextAnchor textAnchor,
                                     float rotateX,
                                     float rotateY,
                                     Paint paint,
                                     float angle)
Draws a string that is aligned by one anchor point and rotated about another anchor point.

Parameters:
text - the text.
canvas - the graphics device.
x - the location of the text anchor.
y - the location of the text anchor.
textAnchor - the text anchor.
rotateX - the x-coordinate for the rotation anchor point.
rotateY - the y-coordinate for the rotation anchor point.
angle - the rotation angle.
